participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and spontaneous, Alex loves trying new recipes and exploring different cultures through food.
participant_1.background: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i've been traveling the world for a years.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and dedicated, Jordan thrives on competition and enjoys sharing her love for cooking with others.
participant_2.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor.

content.text: I'm a professional tennis player too
I am a tennis player. I love to cook. I also love food
I am 23. I rent the world when I cook
